tool_description: Provides detailed information about the client making a request, including IP address, geolocation (city and country), and User Agent.
name: 🔴 IP Info 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 IP Info 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Info
api_list.description:
/info

Method: GET, POST
Description: Retrieves comprehensive information about the client, including IP address, HTTP headers, city, and country based on geolocation.
**Response:**
IP: The IP address of the client.
Headers: A dictionary containing the HTTP headers from the request.
city: The name of the city associated with the client's IP address.
country: The name of the country associated with the client's IP address.
error: An error message if the IP address is not found in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-info-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-info-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IP
api_list.description:
/ip

Method: GET, POST
Description: Retrieves only the IP address of the client.
**Response:**
IP: The IP address of the client.
